title: ISic000166. Epitaph of Cosmia
body:
1D(is) m(anibus)
2❦ Cosmia ❦
3vix(it) · an(nis) · XX

1DM
2❦COSMIA❦
3VIX·AN·XX

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Gualtherus, following Gualtherus' indications of hederae and interpuncts;
  • 3: Gualtherus 1624: VIX.M.XX; Gualtherus 1624[1625]: VIX.MV.XX; as Kaibel suggests, the MV in ligature printed by Gualtherus is presumably a rendering of a poorly legible AN, possibly in ligature.

English translation

Tuuli Ahlholm

To the Shades of the Underworld. Cosmia lived 20 years.

commentary
